content.question: Which of the following best describes the value returned by the method?

choices.label: It returns 2 more than the number of digits in num.
It returns 2 more than the sum of the digits in num.
It returns 2 times the number of digits in num.
It returns 2 times the sum of the digits in num.

content.answer: It returns 2 times the number of digits in num.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
